response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you at a price of $1,300,000. This price reflects the balance between the intrinsic worth of the product and my desire to ensure a fair transaction. I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 1300000}
